articles.author: Esha Mitra, CNN
articles.title: Some people in a cheering crowd called for her to be raped. Many were women
articles.description: Her hair was cut off and her face painted black before she was paraded into the street where some people in a cheering crowd called for her to be raped.
articles.content:
They started hitting and beating my sister. This was happening in front of me, but I just stood there, I didn't know what to do...I was frozen with fear.
Aarti
